00040                 private function reinit()
00041                 {
00042                         // load global config file or die
00043                         if (!file_exists("./config.controller.php"))
00044                                 {
00045                                         die("config file 'config.controller.php' not found!");
00046                                 }
00047                         else if (!__check_syntax("./config.controller.php"))
00048                                 {
00049                                         die("config file 'config.controller.php' is invalid!");
00050                                 }
00051                         else
00052                                 {
00053                                         __session_start();
00054                                         include("./config.controller.php");
00055                                         $_SESSION["_Action"]         = "";
00056                                         $_SESSION["_Errors"]         = "";
00057                                         $_SESSION["_ErrNo"]          = "";
00058                                         $_SESSION["_PageID.current"] = "";
00059                                         $_SESSION["_PageID.last"]    = "";
00060                                         $_SESSION["_SqlType"]        = (isset($_SETTINGS["Main"][0])) ? $_SETTINGS["Main"][0] : false;
00061                                         $_SESSION["_TimeOut"]        = (isset($_SETTINGS["Main"][1])) ? $_SETTINGS["Main"][1] : 300;
00062                                         $_SESSION["_Cookies"]        = (isset($_SETTINGS["Main"][2])) ? $_SETTINGS["Main"][2] : false;
00063                                         $_SESSION["_Webmaster"]      = (isset($_SETTINGS["Main"][3])) ? $_SETTINGS["Main"][3] : "webmaster@localhost";
00064                                         $_SESSION["_Domain"]         = (isset($_SETTINGS["Main"][4])) ? $_SETTINGS["Main"][4] : "localhost";
00065                                         $_SESSION["_MaxWorkingH"]    = (isset($_SETTINGS["Main"][5])) ? $_SETTINGS["Main"][5] : 8;
00066                                         $_SESSION["_TplSqlTable"]    = (isset($_SETTINGS["Template"][3])) ? $_SETTINGS["Template"][3] : false;
00067                                 }
00068                                 
00069                         // try to register needed objects for current session or die
00070                         try
00071                                 {
00072                                         $this->register("Memory",array(),"MEMORY");
00073                                         
00074                                         $this->register("Timer",array("Controller",true),"TIMER.PHP");
00075                                         $_SESSION["TIMER.PHP"]->reset();
00076                                         $_SESSION["TIMER.PHP"]->start();
00077                                         
00078                                         $this->register("MySql", $_SETTINGS["MySql"], "MYSQL");
00079                                         $_SESSION["TIMER.MYSQL"]->reset();
00080                                         
00081                                         $this->register("Template", $_SETTINGS["Template"], "HTML");
00082                                         $this->register("Session",  array(), "CLIENT");
00083                                 }
00084                         catch (Exception $e)
00085                                 {
00086                                         die($e->getMessage());
00087                                 }
00088                 }

00112                 protected function register($classname, $parameters = array(), $alias = "")
00113                 {
00114                         if ($alias != "" && ! isset($_SESSION[$alias]))
00115                                 {
00116                                         $_SESSION[$alias] =& new $classname($parameters);
00117                                 }
00118                         else if (! isset($_SESSION[$classname]) && $alias == "")
00119                                 {
00120                                         $_SESSION[$classname] =& new $classname($parameters);
00121                                 }
00122                 }
00123                 
00134                 protected function unregister($classname, $alias = "")
00135                 {
00136                         if (isset($_SESSION[$classname]))
00137                                 {
00138                                         unset($_SESSION[$classname]);
00139                                 }
00140                         if ($alias != "" && isset($_SESSION[$alias]))
00141                                 {
00142                                         unset($_SESSION[$alias]);
00143                                 }
00144                 }

00167                 public function create_menu()
00168                 {
00169                         if (! $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->is_user())
00170                                 {
00171                                         // no menu for guests!!
00172                                         return;
00173                                 }
00174                                 
00175                         $is_users = false;
00176                         $is_home  = false;
00177                         $is_setup = false;
00178                         
00179                         switch ($_SESSION["_PageID.current"])
00180                                 {
00181                                 case "setup":
00182                                         $is_setup = true;
00183                                         break;
00184                                 case "users":
00185                                 case "details":
00186                                         $is_users = true;
00187                                         break;
00188                                 case "home":
00189                                 default:
00190                                         $is_home = true;
00191                                         break;
00192                                 }
00193                                 
00194                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->menu_insert_entry("Abmelden", "./?action=logout", "Q");
00195                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->menu_insert_spacer();
00196                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->menu_insert_entry("&Uuml;bersicht", "./?page=home", "H", $is_home);
00197                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->menu_insert_entry("Mitarbeiter", "./?page=users", "E", $is_users);
00198                         
00199                         // only admins can edit users
00200                         if ($_SESSION["CLIENT"]->is_admin())
00201                                 {
00202                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->menu_insert_entry("Einstellungen", "./?page=setup", "S", $is_setup);
00203                                 }
00204                                 
00205                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->menu_insert_spacer();
00206                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->menu_insert_entry("[<u>KOMMEN</u>]", "./?action=book&amp;id=1", "K");
00207                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->menu_insert_entry("[<u>GEHEN</u>]", "./?action=book&amp;id=0", "G");
00208                 }

00217                 public function create_page()
00218                 {
00219                         if (! $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->is_user())
00220                                 {
00221                                         if ($_SESSION["_PageID.current"] == "passwd")
00222                                                 {
00223                                                         // load template
00224                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->load("passwd.html");
00225                                                         // send page to browser
00226                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->output("passwd.html");
00227                                                 }
00228                                         else
00229                                                 {
00230                                                         // load template
00231                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->load("login.html");
00232                                                         // send page to browser
00233                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->output("login.html");
00234                                                 }
00235                                 }
00236                         else
00237                                 {
00238                                         switch ($_SESSION["_PageID.current"])
00239                                                 {
00240                                                 case "users":
00241                                                         $this->show_user_table();
00242                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->output("users.html");
00243                                                         break;
00244                                                 case "details":
00245                                                         $this->show_user_details();
00246                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->output("details.html");
00247                                                         break;
00248                                                 case "setup":
00249                                                         if ($_SESSION["CLIENT"]->is_admin())
00250                                                                 {
00251                                                                         $this->show_setup();
00252                                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->output("setup.html");
00253                                                                         break;
00254                                                                 }
00255                                                         $_SESSION["_Errors"] = "Warnung! Sie sind dazu nicht berechtig!";
00256                                                 case "home":
00257                                                 default:
00258                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "<!--MID-->", $_SESSION["_UserData"]["mid"]);
00259                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "<!--FIRST_NAME-->", $_SESSION["_UserData"]["firstname"]);
00260                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "<!--LAST_NAME-->", $_SESSION["_UserData"]["lastname"]);
00261                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "<!--LOGIN_NAME-->", $_SESSION["_UserData"]["email"]);

00264                                                         
00265                                                         // list last bookings
00266                                                         $this->show_last_bookings();
00267                                                         
00268                                                         // summary calculation and assignment for current week and month
00269                                                         $array = $this->get_booking_sums("WEEK");
00270                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "<!--SUM_WEEK_NOW-->",$array["Stunden"]);
00271                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "{{SUM_WEEK_NOW_TL}}",$array["Von"]." - ".$array["Bis"]);
00272                                                         $array = $this->get_booking_sums("MONTH");
00273                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "<!--SUM_MONTH_NOW-->",$array["Stunden"]);
00274                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "{{SUM_MONTH_NOW_TL}}",$array["Von"]." - ".$array["Bis"]);
00275                                                         
00276                                                         // summary calculation and assignment for last week and month
00277                                                         $array = $this->get_booking_sums("WEEK", 1);
00278                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "<!--SUM_WEEK_LAST-->",$array["Stunden"]);
00279                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "{{SUM_WEEK_LAST_TL}}",$array["Von"]." - ".$array["Bis"]);
00280                                                         $array = $this->get_booking_sums("MONTH", 1);
00281                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "<!--SUM_MONTH_LAST-->",$array["Stunden"]);
00282                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "{{SUM_MONTH_LAST_TL}}",$array["Von"]." - ".$array["Bis"]);
00283                                                         
00284                                                         // send page to browser
00285                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->output("index.html");
00286                                                         break;
00287                                                 }
00288                                 }

00298                 public function prepare_templates()
00299                 {
00300                         if (! isset($_SESSION["_cached"]) || ! $_SESSION["_cached"])
00301                                 {
00302                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->import();
00303                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->preload();
00304                                         $_SESSION["_cached"] = $this->cache_on;
00305                                 }

00307                 
00321                 protected function get_booking_sums($range = "DAY", $offset = 0, $limit = 1)
00322                 {
00323                         $group = "";
00324                         $start = "";
00325                         $stop  = "";
00326                         $redat = "";
00327                         switch (strtoupper($range))
00328                                 {
00329                                 case "YEAR":
00330                                         $redat = "DATE_SUB( NOW(), INTERVAL $offset YEAR )";
00331                                         $start = "DATE_FORMAT( $redat, '01.01.%Y' )";
00332                                         $stop  = "DATE_FORMAT( $redat, '31.12.%Y' )";
00333                                         $group = "%Y";
00334                                         $range = "SameYear";
00335                                         break;
00336                                 case "MONTH":
00337                                         $redat = "DATE_SUB( NOW(), INTERVAL $offset MONTH )";
00338                                         $start = "DATE_FORMAT( $redat, '%Y-%m-01' )";
00339                                         $stop  = "LAST_DAY( $redat )";
00340                                         $group = "%m";
00341                                         $range = "SameMonth";
00342                                         break;
00343                                 case "WEEK":
00344                                         $redat = "DATE_SUB( NOW(), INTERVAL $offset WEEK )";
00345                                         $start = "DATE_SUB( $redat, INTERVAL DAYOFWEEK( $redat ) - 2 DAY )";
00346                                         $stop  = "DATE_SUB( $redat, INTERVAL DAYOFWEEK( $redat ) - 8 DAY )";
00347                                         $group = "%u";
00348                                         $range = "SameWeek";
00349                                         break;
00350                                 case "DAY":
00351                                 default:
00352                                         $redat = "DATE_SUB( NOW(), INTERVAL $offset DAY )";
00353                                         $start = "DATE_SUB( NOW(), INTERVAL $offset DAY )";
00354                                         $stop  = "DATE_SUB( NOW(), INTERVAL $offset DAY )";
00355                                         $group = "%j";
00356                                         $range = "SameDay";
00357                                         break;
00358                                 }
00359                                 
00360                         $query  = "SELECT DATE_FORMAT( $redat, '$group' ) AS $range, ";
00361                         $query .= "DATE_FORMAT( $start , '%d.%m.%Y' ) AS Von, ";
00362                         $query .= "DATE_FORMAT( $stop , '%d.%m.%Y' ) AS Bis, ";
00363                         $query .= "SEC_TO_TIME( IFNULL( SUM( UNIX_TIMESTAMP( stamp_2 ) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP( stamp_1 ) ), 0 ) ) as Stunden, ";
00364                         $query .= "IF( bookid = NULL, 0, COUNT( bookid ) ) AS Besuche FROM tr_bookings ";
00365                         $query .= "WHERE mid = '".$_SESSION["_UserData"]["mid"]."' AND ";
00366                         $query .= "DATE( stamp_1 ) >= DATE( $start ) AND DATE( stamp_1 ) <= DATE( $stop );";
00367                         
00368                         $array = $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->query_all($query);
00369                         
00370                         // future use, if multiple row read implemented
00371                         if ($limit > 1)
00372                                 {
00373                                         return $array;
00374                                 }
00375                                 
00376                         return $array[0];
00377                 }

00390                 protected function show_last_bookings($limit=10)
00391                 {
00392                         $this->set_table_order("last_bookings", array("stamp_1", "Gekommen", "Gegangen", "Anwesend"), 10);
00393                         
00394                         $query  = "SELECT COUNT( stamp_1 ) AS total FROM tr_bookings ";
00395                         $query .= "WHERE mid = '".$_SESSION["_UserData"]["mid"]."' GROUP BY mid;";
00396                         $entry  = $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->query_first($query);
00397                         
00398                         $plink = new PageLink("last_bookings", $entry["total"]);
00399                         
00400                         $query  = "SELECT DATE_FORMAT( stamp_1, '%d.%m.%Y' ) AS Datum, ";
00401                         $query .= "DATE_FORMAT( stamp_1, '%T Uhr' ) AS Gekommen, ";
00402                         $query .= "DATE_FORMAT( stamp_2, '%T Uhr' ) AS Gegangen, ";
00403                         $query .= "SEC_TO_TIME( UNIX_TIMESTAMP( stamp_2 ) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP( stamp_1 ) ) AS Anwesend ";
00404                         $query .= "FROM tr_bookings ";
00405                         $query .= "WHERE mid = '".$_SESSION["_UserData"]["mid"]."' ";
00406                         $query .= "ORDER BY ".$_SESSION["_OrderBy"]["last_bookings"]." ".$plink->get_query_limit();
00407                         
00408                         $book = $this->query2table($query,"last_bookings",array(),false,true);
00409                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "<!--HISTORY_DATA-->",$book);
00410                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "<!--HISTORY_PAGE_LINK-->",$plink);
00411                 }

00420                 protected function show_user_table($limit=10)
00421                 {
00422                         $this->set_table_order("user_table", array("mid", "email", "firstname", "lastname", "groupname"), 0);
00423                         
00424                         $query  = "SELECT COUNT( email ) AS total FROM tr_users;";
00425                         $entry  = $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->query_first($query);
00426                         
00427                         $plink = new PageLink("user_table", $entry["total"]);
00428                         
00429                         $query  = "SELECT u.mid AS MID, u.email AS Email, ";
00430                         $query .= "u.firstname AS Vorname, u.lastname AS Nachname, g.groupname AS Gruppe ";
00431                         $query .= "FROM tr_users u ";
00432                         $query .= "LEFT JOIN tr_groups g USING ( gid ) ";
00433                         $query .= "GROUP BY mid ";
00434                         $query .= "ORDER BY ".$_SESSION["_OrderBy"]["user_table"]." ".$plink->get_query_limit();
00435                         
00436                         $users = $this->query2table($query,"user_table", array(60, 290, 200, 200), true, true);
00437                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("users.html", "<!--USER_TABLE-->",$users);
00438                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("users.html", "<!--USER_PAGE_LINK-->",$plink);
00439                 }

00448                 protected function show_setup()
00449                 {
00450                         $select = array("-1" => "");
00451                         $edit   = array("name1" => "", "name2" => "", "pass" => "");
00452                         
00453                         $query  = "SELECT mid, email FROM tr_users ORDER BY email;";
00454                         $array  = $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->query_all($query);
00455                         
00456                         // reformat array for creating select menu
00457                         foreach($array as $key => $value)
00458                         {
00459                                 $select[$value["mid"]] = $value["email"];
00460                         }
00461                         
00462                         // check for selected item
00463                         $selected_user  = -1;
00464                         $selected_group = -1;
00465                         
00466                         if (isset($_POST["edit_mid"]))
00467                                 {
00468                                         $selected_user = @intval($_POST["edit_mid"]);
00469                                         if ($_POST["submit"] == "LADEN" && $selected_user >= 0)
00470                                                 {
00471                                                         $query  = "SELECT mid, firstname, lastname, gid FROM ";
00472                                                         $query .= "tr_users WHERE mid='$selected_user';";
00473                                                         $array  = $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->query_all($query);
00474                                                         
00475                                                         $edit["name1"]  = $array[0]["firstname"];
00476                                                         $edit["name2"]  = $array[0]["lastname"];
00477                                                         $selected_user  = $array[0]["mid"];
00478                                                         $selected_group = $array[0]["gid"];
00479                                                 }
00480                                         else if ($_POST["submit"] == "SPEICHERN" && $selected_user >= 0)
00481                                                 {
00482                                                         $edit["name1"]  = ucfirst(trim($_POST["new_firstname"]));
00483                                                         $edit["name2"]  = ucfirst(trim($_POST["new_lastname"]));
00484                                                         $selected_user  = @intval($_POST["edit_mid"]);
00485                                                         $selected_group = @intval($_POST["new_group"]);
00486                                                         
00487                                                         if ($selected_group == 1 || $selected_group < 0 || $selected_group > 3)
00488                                                                 {
00489                                                                         $_SESSION["_Errors"] = "Sie haben keine bekannte Gruppe selektiert!";
00490                                                                 }
00491                                                         else
00492                                                                 {
00493                                                                         $query  = "UPDATE tr_users SET ";
00494                                                                         $query .= "firstname = '".$edit["name1"]."', ";
00495                                                                         $query .= "lastname = '".$edit["name2"]."', ";
00496                                                                         $query .= "gid = '$selected_group' ";
00497                                                                         $query .= "WHERE mid='$selected_user';";
00498                                                                         $result = $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->query($query);
00499                                                                 }
00500                                                 }
00501                                 }
00502                                 
00503                         $users_select = $_SESSION["HTML"]->create_select($select, $selected_user);
00504                         $group_select = $_SESSION["HTML"]->create_select(array(1=>"",0=>"Administrator",2=>"Mitarbeiter",3=>"Buchhaltung"), $selected_group);
00505                         
00506                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("setup.html", "{{EDIT_FIRSTNAME}}", $edit["name1"]);
00507                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("setup.html", "{{EDIT_LASTNAME}}",  $edit["name2"]);
00508                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("setup.html", "{{EDIT_PASSWORD}}",  $edit["pass"]);
00509                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("setup.html", "<!--USER_SELECT-->", $users_select);
00510                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("setup.html", "<!--GROUP_SELECT-->", $group_select);
00511                 }

00520                 public function show_user_details()
00521                 {
00522                         if (! isset($_GET["id"]))
00523                                 {
00524                                         throw new Exception("Sie haben keine Benutzer-ID angegeben!",999);
00525                                 }
00526                         else if (! $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->is_admin() && ! $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->is_accounting())
00527                                 {
00528                                         throw new Exception("Sie sind dazu nicht berechtigt!",998);
00529                                 }
00530                                 
00531                         $mid = intval($_GET["id"]);
00532                         
00533                         $query    = "SELECT firstname, lastname FROM tr_users WHERE mid = '$mid';";
00534                         $details  = $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->query_first($query);
00535                         
00536                         $query  = "SELECT DATE_FORMAT( stamp_1, '%d.%m.%Y' ) AS Datum, ";
00537                         $query .= "SEC_TO_TIME( IFNULL( SUM( UNIX_TIMESTAMP( stamp_2 ) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP( stamp_1 ) ), 0 ) ) as 'Stunden anwesend', ";
00538                         $query .= "IF( bookid = NULL, 0, COUNT( bookid ) ) AS 'Anzahl Buchungen' ";
00539                         $query .= "FROM tr_bookings ";
00540                         $query .= "WHERE mid = '$mid' GROUP BY Datum ORDER BY Datum ASC";
00541                         
00542                         $content = $this->query2table($query,"booking_details");
00543                         
00544                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("details.html", "<!--FIRST_NAME-->",$details["firstname"]);
00545                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("details.html", "<!--LAST_NAME-->", $details["lastname"]);
00546                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("details.html", "<!--DETAILS-->",   $content);
00547                 }
00548                 
00560                 protected function set_table_order($tableid, $ordervalues, $default = 0)
00561                 {
00562                         if (! is_array($_SESSION["_OrderBy"]) || ! is_array($_SESSION["_OrderID"]))
00563                                 {
00564                                         $_SESSION["_OrderID"] = array();
00565                                         $_SESSION["_OrderBy"] = array();
00566                                 }
00567                                 
00568                         if (! isset($_SESSION["_OrderBy"][$tableid]) || isset($_GET["order"]))
00569                                 {
00570                                         $_SESSION["_OrderID"][$tableid] = (isset($_GET["order"]))?(intval($_GET["order"])-10):($default-10);
00571                                         $direc = ($_SESSION["_OrderID"][$tableid]>=0)?"DESC":"ASC";
00572                                         $order = ($_SESSION["_OrderID"][$tableid]<0)?($_SESSION["_OrderID"][$tableid]+10):$_SESSION["_OrderID"][$tableid];
00573                                         
00574                                         if (isset($ordervalues[$order]))
00575                                                 {
00576                                                         $order = $ordervalues[$order];
00577                                                 }
00578                                         else
00579                                                 {
00580                                                         $order = $ordervalues[0];
00581                                                 }
00582                                         $_SESSION["_OrderBy"][$tableid] = "$order $direc";
00583                                 }
00584                 }
00585                 
00598                 protected function query2table($query,$id,$width = array(),$details = false, $orderon = false)
00599                 {
00600                         $details = $details && ($_SESSION["CLIENT"]->is_admin() || $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->is_accounting());
00601                         $result  = $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->query($query);
00602                         $first   = true;
00603                         $dump    = "<table id=\"$id\">";
00604                         while ($row = $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->fetch_array($result))
00605                                 {
00606                                         // append only keys on first line
00607                                         if ($first)
00608                                                 {
00609                                                         $dump .= "<tr>";
00610                                                         $sid   = "";
00611                                                         
00612                                                         if (ini_get("session.use_cookies") != "1")
00613                                                                 {
00614                                                                         $sid = "&amp;".ini_get("session.name")."=".session_id();
00615                                                                 }
00616                                                                 
00617                                                         foreach(array_keys($row) as $key => $value)
00618                                                         {
00619                                                                 $td_width = "";
00620                                                                 
00621                                                                 // correct width if set (in pixels)
00622                                                                 if (isset($width[$key]))
00623                                                                         {
00624                                                                                 $td_width = " style=\"width:".$width[$key]."px;\"";
00625                                                                         }
00626                                                                         
00627                                                                 $dump .= "<td{$td_width}><b>";
00628                                                                 
00629                                                                 if ($orderon)
00630                                                                         {
00631                                                                                 $order = ($_SESSION["_OrderID"][$id]<0)?($_SESSION["_OrderID"][$id]+10):$_SESSION["_OrderID"][$id];
00632                                                                                 $arrow_up = "";
00633                                                                                 $arrow_dn = "";
00634                                                                                 
00635                                                                                 // highlight active buttons
00636                                                                                 if ($order == $key)
00637                                                                                         {
00638                                                                                                 if ($_SESSION["_OrderID"][$id] < 0)
00639                                                                                                         $arrow_up = "_active";
00640                                                                                                 else
00641                                                                                                         $arrow_dn = "_active";
00642                                                                                         }
00643                                                                                         
00644                                                                                 $dump .= "<a href=\"./?page=".$_SESSION["_PageID.current"]."&amp;order=".$key.$sid."\" target=\"_self\"><img src=\"./images/order_arrow_up{$arrow_up}.png\" alt=\"aufsteigend nach $value sortiert\" title=\"aufsteigend nach $value sortiert\" border=\"0\" width=\"12\" height=\"12\" /></a>&nbsp;";
00645                                                                                 $dump .= "<a href=\"./?page=".$_SESSION["_PageID.current"]."&amp;order=".($key+10).$sid."\" target=\"_self\"><img src=\"./images/order_arrow_down{$arrow_dn}.png\" alt=\"absteigend nach $value sortiert\" title=\"absteigend nach $value sortiert\" border=\"0\" width=\"12\" height=\"12\" /></a>&nbsp;";
00646                                                                         }
00647                                                                 $dump .= $value;
00648                                                                 $dump .= "</b></td>";
00649                                                         }
00650                                                         
00651                                                         if ($details)
00652                                                                 {
00653                                                                         $dump .= "<td>&nbsp;</td>";
00654                                                                 }
00655                                                                 
00656                                                         $dump .= "</tr>";
00657                                                         $first = false;
00658                                                 }
00659                                         // append data rows
00660                                         $dump .= "<tr><td>";
00661                                         
00662                                         $dump .= implode("</td><td>", $row);
00663                                         
00664                                         if ($details)
00665                                                 {
00666                                                         $dump .= "<td><a href=\"./?page=details&amp;id=".$row["MID"].$sid."\" target=\"_self\"><img src=\"./images/more_infos.png\" alt=\"Details zu ".$row["Vorname"]." ".$row["Nachname"]."\" title=\"Details zu ".$row["Vorname"]." ".$row["Nachname"]."\" border=\"0\" width=\"12\" height=\"12\" /></a></td>";
00667                                                 }
00668                                                 
00669                                         $dump .= "</td></tr>";
00670                                 }
00671                         $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->free_result($result);
00672                         if ($first) $dump .= "<tr><td>keine Eintr&auml;ge gefunden...</td></tr>";
00673                         // close table
00674                         $dump  .= "</table>";
00675                         return $dump;
00676                 }
00677                 
00685                 public function prepare_actions()
00686                 {
00687                         // clean previous errors
00688                         $_SESSION["_Errors"] = "";
00689                         
00690                         // save post or get value from "page"
00691                         if (isset($_POST["page"]))
00692                                 {
00693                                         $_SESSION["_PageID.last"] = isset($_SESSION["_PageID.current"]) ? $_SESSION["_PageID.current"] : "home";
00694                                         $_SESSION["_PageID.current"] = $_POST["page"];
00695                                 }
00696                         else if (isset($_GET["page"]))
00697                                 {
00698                                         $_SESSION["_PageID.last"] = isset($_SESSION["_PageID.current"]) ? $_SESSION["_PageID.current"] : "home";
00699                                         $_SESSION["_PageID.current"] = $_GET["page"];
00700                                 }
00701                         else
00702                                 {
00703                                         $_SESSION["_PageID.current"] = "home";
00704                                         $_SESSION["_PageID.last"] = "home";
00705                                 }
00706                                 
00707                         // save post or get value from "action"
00708                         if (isset($_POST["action"]))
00709                                 {
00710                                         $_SESSION["_Action"] = $_POST["action"];
00711                                 }
00712                         else if (isset($_GET["action"]))
00713                                 {
00714                                         $_SESSION["_Action"] = $_GET["action"];
00715                                 }
00716                         else
00717                                 {
00718                                         $_SESSION["_Action"] = "";
00719                                 }
00720                                 
00721                         // extend session of user, if valid
00722                         $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->extend();
00723                         
00724                         // try to execute session actions
00725                         try
00726                                 {
00727                                         switch ($_SESSION["_Action"])
00728                                                 {
00729                                                 case "login":
00730                                                         $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->login();
00731                                                         break;
00732                                                 case "logout":
00733                                                         $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->logout();
00734                                                         break;
00735                                                 case "book":
00736                                                         $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->book();
00737                                                         break;
00738                                                 case "update":
00739                                                         $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->update();
00740                                                         break;
00741                                                 case "delete":
00742                                                         $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->delete();
00743                                                         break;
00744                                                 case "create":
00745                                                         $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->create();
00746                                                         break;
00747                                                 case "passwd":
00748                                                         $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->passwd();
00749                                                         break;
00750                                                 }
00751                                 }
00752                         catch (Exception $e)
00753                                 {
00754                                         $_SESSION["_Errors"] .= $e->getMessage();
00755                                         $_SESSION["_ErrNo"]   = $e->getCode();
00756                                 }
00757                 }
00758                 
00759         }
